body_text:
Took me a bit, but I got babili to compile the vendors file.
For what it's worth, babili's end file size is larger and it's slower: ~4.4mb after ~2 min. UglifyJS gives us ~3mb after ~50s. I understand the point of using babili across the board, but IMO it makes more sense to use the process that gives us the better compression in this case.
body:

For what it's worth, babili's end file size is larger _and_ it's slower: ~4.4mb after ~2 min. UglifyJS gives us ~3mb after ~50s. I understand the point of using babili across the board, but IMO it makes more sense to use the process that gives us the better compression in this case.
body_html:
Took me a bit, but I got babili to compile the vendors file.

For what it's worth, babili's end file size is larger and it's slower: ~4.4mb after ~2 min. UglifyJS gives us ~3mb after ~50s. I understand the point of using babili across the board, but IMO it makes more sense to use the process that gives us the better compression in this case.
